#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType StrokeDetail.

== Name ==

StrokeDetail (complexType)

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--StrokeDetail (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Elements used to record details about a golf stroke.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===
{{{
          <...  drop = xs:boolean  number = xs:nonNegativeInteger>  (position?, time?, golf-club?, landing?, precision?, distance?, distance-to-hole?, comment?  )</...>
}}}
----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| [CNote.html golfml:Note] || [CNote.html comment] ||  Comment about the stroke. ||
|| xs:double || distance ||  											Distance of the stroke.					 ||
|| xs:double || distance-to-hole ||  											Distance left to the hole BEFORE the stroke.					 ||
|| [CGolfClub.html golfml:GolfClub] || [CGolfClub.html golf-club] ||  					Golf club used for stroke.				 ||
|| [SGolfCourseAreaTypeEnum.html golfml:GolfCourseAreaTypeEnum] || [SGolfCourseAreaTypeEnum.html landing] ||  					Information on landing are of stroke.				 ||
|| [CPosition.html golfml:Position] || [CPosition.html position] ||  					Position FROM where the stroke take place.				 ||
|| [CStrokePrecision.html golfml:StrokePrecision] || [CStrokePrecision.html precision] ||  					Information on the precision of the stroke regarding distance and direction.				 ||
|| xs:dateTime || time ||  					Time of stroke.				 ||      

=== Attribute Summary ===
        
|| xs:boolean || `drop` ||  				Boolean flag indicating if the stroke was a drop.			 ||
|| xs:nonNegativeInteger || `number` ||  				Order number of the stroke playing the hole.			 ||

=== Attribute Detail ===

				Boolean flag indicating if the stroke was a drop.
